excerpt: Discover our story here Join the White Knight Academy community White Knight Academy…
content:
Discover our story here

Join the White Knight Academy community

White Knight Academy is a new international chess training platform built by lifelong chess players with 30+ years of experience at the board. We started playing competitively from the age of five, later gained experience in international tournaments, and coached both kids and adults. Today we’re building a modern academy that combines structured learning paths, real coach feedback, and smart tools — so students don’t have to guess what to study next.

Based between Poland and Canada (including a small chess club community in Edmonton), we’re designing a schedule that works across time zones and supports students worldwide. Our mission is simple: make chess improvement clear, motivating, and accessible — from the first moves to confident tournament play, including classical chess and Chess960.

  • Become a member of the White Knight community today!
Where players grow and friendships begin

White Knight is more than a set of lessons — it’s a place where students train together, learn from mistakes, and stay consistent. You can join small-group classes or choose 1-to-1 coaching, follow guided training tasks, and get support with game reviews and practical preparation for upcoming events. As we grow, we’re expanding our coaching team with professional trainers, including grandmasters, to help every student improve with a clear plan and a supportive community around them.

Training Method

Build a clear routine: learn, practice, review — and improve every week

Game Review

Understand your mistakes with coach feedback and AI-assisted analysis

Competitive Mindset

Play challenges and sparring sessions that prepare you for real tournaments

Global Community

Train across time zones and connect with players who share your goals

Your chess adventure

We build a home for chess improvement

Strategic community hub

White Knight connects students and coaches across time zones — a place to train, ask questions, review games, and learn together. From beginners to competitive players, everyone follows a clear path with real feedback.

Unique moments for all

Join sparring sessions, themed training events, and guided challenges — in classical chess and Chess960. With AI-assisted analysis and coach support, every game becomes a lesson and every lesson becomes progress.

Join White Knight

Kids learn fast — and love it

My 10-year-old started as a complete beginner, and the progress has been amazing. The coach explains things clearly, keeps lessons engaging, and gives simple homework we can actually follow. I love that my child is learning focus, patience, and confidence — not just chess moves.
Noah Carter

Austin, TX

Structured training after work

After work, I needed a structured way to improve without wasting time. The lessons are practical, the feedback is specific, and the small-group format keeps me motivated. Game reviews helped me spot the same mistakes I kept repeating — and my results in rapid games improved quickly.
Ella Kim

Houston, TX

A great comeback to chess

I returned to chess after 20 years and wasn’t sure where to begin. White Knight made it comfortable and enjoyable from the first lesson. The pace is friendly, the coach is patient, and I feel my thinking is sharper again. It’s a great routine — learning, playing, and improving step by step.
David Turner

Dallas, TX
